name: PixelPups
description:
PixelPups is simple! Don’t kill your pup. Just like real life. If you kill your pup, you don’t deserve to have a puppy in real life.

Click the food button then drag the food over to your pup; this gives you food points.

Click the play button then swipe the ball in a direction and the pup will chase after it; this gives you attention points.

Don’t overfeed your pup or it will lose attention and sleep points.

Don’t overplay with your pup or it will lose food and sleep points.

Features:

  • 5 different types of pups!
  • Name your Pup!
  • Unique Pup bark for each dog you create!
  • 3 cool shop items!
  • Day/night cycle (around every 2 minutes)!
  • Murder >:^(
  • Death counter for murderers >:(
  • Saving so you can come back to your pup at a later stage!

Made By Chillehh for Ludum Dare 46
